com.mgnt.lifecycle.management.backgroundrunner

Class BaseBackgroundRunnable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mgnt.lifecycle.management.BaseEntity<BaseBackgroundRunnable>
      • com.mgnt.lifecycle.management.backgroundrunner.BaseBackgroundRunnable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BackgroundRunnable, java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TypeOneTask, TypeTwoTask

    public abstract class BaseBackgroundRunnable
extends BaseEntity<BaseBackgroundRunnable>
implements BackgroundRunnable
    This is the base class for any user defined periodic Task classes See source code example in package com.mgnt.lifecycle.management.backgroundrunner.example that demonstrates how it is done

        protected abstract void initParamsForSpecificImplementation()
        A hook method to be implemented by user extensions of this class. See source code example in package com.mgnt.lifecycle.management.backgroundrunner.example

      • initTimeIntervalParam

        public void initTimeIntervalParam(java.lang.String valueStr,
                                  TimeInterval defaultValue,
                                  java.lang.String propertyName)
        This method parses String value into a TimeInterval and then invokes method BackgroundRunnable.setParamValue(TimeInterval, String) to set required property value. If parsing failed then default value is used.
        Specified by:
        initTimeIntervalParam in interface BackgroundRunnable
        Parameters:
        valueStr - String that contains a Time interval value such as "9h", "3m", "10s" etc
        defaultValue - TimeInterval that holds a default value for the property should parsing of valueStr parameter fails
        propertyName - The name of the property to be set
